description: cmd/hgapplydiff: update usage for the hgpatch/hgapplydiff rename.

messages.text:
What about os.Args[0] instead, so we don't have to change it in the future ?

On Mon, Feb 11, 2013 at 11:44 AM, David Symonds <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM
>

cmd/hgapplydiff: update usage for the hgpatch/hgapplydiff rename.

R=dsymonds, dave
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7306079

Hello dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.codereview

On Mon, Feb 11, 2013 at 11:45 AM, Dave Cheney <dave@cheney.net> wrote:
> What about os.Args[0] instead, so we don't have to change it in the future ?

Well, the name is unlikely to change in the future, and you'd probably
want path.Base(os.Args[0]) anyway... This change seems simplest.

LGTM

> Well, the name is unlikely to change in the future, and you'd probably
> want path.Base(os.Args[0]) anyway... This change seems simplest.

We'll see ...
